biocontainers.name: bioconductor-edaseq
biocontainers.summary: Numerical and graphical summaries of rna-seq read data. within-lane normalization procedures to adjust for gc-content effect (or other gene-level effects) on read counts: loess robust local regression, global-scaling, and full-quantile normalization (risso et al., 2011). between-lane normalization procedures to adjust for distributional differences between lanes (e.g., sequencing depth): global-scaling and full-quantile normalization (bullard et al., 2010).
